text: Charles N'Zogbia (born 28 May 1986) is a French former professional footballer who played as a right or left winger, but also as an attacking midfielder. == Career statistics == Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Newcastle United 2004–05 Premier League 14 0 2 0 0 0 6 0 22 0 2005–06 32 5 3 0 2 0 4 0 41 5 2006–07 22 0 0 0 2 0 11 0 35 0 2007–08 32 3 3 0 0 0 – 35 3 2008–09 18 1 2 0 2 0 – 22 1 Total 118 9 10 0 6 0 21 0 155 9 Wigan Athletic 2008–09 Premier League 13 1 0 0 0 0 – 13 1 2009–10 36 5 3 2 0 0 – 39 7 2010–11 34 9 0 0 4 1 – 38 10 Total Total 83 15 3 2 4 1 – 90 18 Aston Villa 2011–12 Premier League 30 2 0 0 2 0 – 32 2 2012–13 21 2 2 0 5 1 – 26 3 2013–14 0 0 0 0 0 0 – 0 0 2014–15 27 0 4 0 0 0 – 31 0 2015–16 2 0 0 0 0 0 – 2 0 Total 80 4 6 0 7 1 – 91 5 Career total 281 28 19 2 17 2 21 0 338 32 ==Honours== Newcastle United *UEFA Intertoto Cup: 2006 Aston Villa *FA Cup runner-up: 2014–15 == References == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Normandy Category:People from Seine-Maritime
title: Charles N'Zogbia
